api_list.name: Get hCaptcha result
api_list.description: Get the result of hCaptcha solver.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hcaptcha-solver1.p.rapidapi.com/get_result"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hcaptcha-solver1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
